mapper.select:
select t_camping.camping_id as camping_id, count(camping_reply_id) as reply_count, t_camping.member_id as member_id, camping_title, camping_hit, camping_regdate, camping_region, camping_recruitment, camping_applicant, camping_departure, camping_period, camping_close from t_camping left join t_camping_reply on t_camping.camping_id = t_camping_reply.camping_id where
and camping_deleteYN = 'N' group by t_camping.camping_id order by t_camping.camping_close DESC, t_camping.camping_id DESC limit 0, 10;

select camping_id, member_id, camping_title, camping_regdate, camping_region, camping_recruitment, camping_applicant, camping_departure, camping_period, camping_text, camping_hit, camping_close, camping_campsite , campsite_address, campsite_lat, campsite_lon from t_camping, t_campsite where t_camping.camping_campsite = t_campsite.campsite_name and t_camping.camping_id = #{camping_id};
mapper.insert: insert into t_camping(member_id, camping_recruitment, camping_title, camping_text, camping_departure, camping_period, camping_region, camping_campsite) values (#{member_id}, #{camping_recruitment}, #{camping_title}, #{camping_text}, #{camping_departure}, #{camping_period}, #{camping_region}, #{camping_campsite});
mapper.update: update t_camping set camping_deleteYN = 'Y' where camping_id = #{camping_id};
mapper.select: select * from t_camping_reply where camping_id = #{camping_id} order by camping_reply_regdate DESC limit 5
select count(*) as 'camping_reply_count' from t_camping_reply where camping_id = #{camping_id};
mapper.insert: insert into t_camping_reply(camping_id, member_id, camping_reply_text) values(#{camping_id}, #{id}, #{comment});
mapper.select: select * from t_camping_reply where camping_id=#{camping_id} order by camping_reply_regdate DESC limit #{s_count}, 5;
mapper.update: update t_camping set camping_hit = camping_hit+1 where camping_id = #{camping_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) as 'camping_count' from t_camping where

select t_camping.camping_id as camping_id, count(camping_reply_id) as reply_count, t_camping.member_id as member_id, camping_title, camping_hit, camping_regdate, camping_region, camping_recruitment, camping_applicant, camping_departure, camping_period, camping_close from t_camping left join t_camping_reply on t_camping.camping_id = t_camping_reply.camping_id where
and camping_deleteYN = 'N' group by t_camping.camping_id order by t_camping.camping_close DESC, t_camping.camping_id DESC limit ${page_count}, 10;

sql.if: and camping_title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or camping_text like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') or t_camping.member_id like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

and campsite_address like CONCAT('%',"",'%')

and campsite_name like CONCAT('%',"",'%')
